Token.Abstract: Initialize Settings Initializes the device settings.
Only for TS100 Control reader to make a specified sound beep.

Parameter.Name: buzzerCtrl
Parameter.Abstract: buzzerMode

Token.Abstract: SetRepeatTime

Parameter.Name: isTemp
Parameter.Abstract: If the value is true, this setting will write into EEPROM.

Parameter.Name: time
Parameter.Abstract: Unit: 0.1 seconds 0: Immediately 1~253: 0.1~25.3 seconds *254: Never repeat

Token.Abstract: cmdGetRepeatTime

Parameter.Name: isTemp
Parameter.Abstract: If the value is true, this setting will write into EEPROM.

Token.Abstract: Only for TS800 & UR0250 Set Scan Mode

Parameter.Name: isTemp
Parameter.Abstract: If the value is true, this setting will write into EEPROM.

Parameter.Name: scanMode
Parameter.Abstract: Scan Mode

Token.Abstract: Only for TS800 & UR0250 Get Trigger Source

Parameter.Name: isTemp
Parameter.Abstract: If the value is true, this setting will write into EEPROM.

Token.Abstract: Only for TS800 & UR0250 Set Trigger Sourec

Parameter.Name: isTemp
Parameter.Abstract: If the value is true, this setting will write into EEPROM.

Parameter.Name: triggerType
Parameter.Abstract: The trigger source of inventory.

Token.Abstract: Get Q Value Gets the starting Q value for the number of slots in the round.

Parameter.Name: isTemp
Parameter.Abstract: If the value is true, this setting will write into EEPROM.

Token.Abstract: Set Q Value Sets the starting Q value for the number of slots in the round.

Parameter.Name: isTemp
Parameter.Abstract: If the value is true, this setting will write into EEPROM.

Parameter.Name: qvalue
Parameter.Abstract: The starting Q value for the number of slots in the round. The value ranges from 0 to 15.

Token.Abstract: Get Session & Target Gets the session flag used for inventory round. Gets the target for inventory round.

Parameter.Name: isTemp
Parameter.Abstract: If the value is true, this setting will write into EEPROM.

Token.Abstract: Set Session & Target Sets the target for inventory round. Sets the session flag used for inventory round.

Parameter.Name: isTemp
Parameter.Abstract: True value specifies the changes are temporary overwrides for settings. The changes are not saved into the EEPROM and take immediate effect (no rebooting required). False value specifies the changes are permanently overwrides for settings And also saved into the EEPROM. The changes will keep after rebooting the device.

Parameter.Name: target
Parameter.Abstract: Target indicates whether the Select modifies a Tagâ€™s SL flag or its inventoried flag

Parameter.Name: session
Parameter.Abstract: The session flag to be selected for an inventory round

Token.Abstract: Get Rf Power Gets the RF Power strength.

Parameter.Name: isTemp
Parameter.Abstract: If the value is true, this setting will write into EEPROM.

Token.Abstract: Sets the RF Power strength.

Parameter.Name: isTemp
Parameter.Abstract: True value specifies the changes are temporary overwrides for settings. The changes are not saved into the EEPROM and take immediate effect (no rebooting required). False value specifies the changes are permanently overwrides for settings And also saved into the EEPROM. The changes will keep after rebooting the device.

Parameter.Name: rfPower
Parameter.Abstract: Specifies the RF Power strength. The value is ranging from 1 to 27. The default value is 11. (Range:1~27)

Token.Abstract: Get the RX RF input sensitivity level.

Define the RX RF input sensitivity level.

RX Sensitivity setting defines the RX input sensitivity level.

Parameter.Name: isTemp
Parameter.Abstract: Write the sensitivity value to RAM or not. It the value is true, the sensitivity value will be write.

Parameter.Name: sensitivity
Parameter.Abstract: Specifies the RF input sensitivity level.

Token.Abstract: Get Frequency List Gets the channel of hopping frequency in MHz.

Parameter.Name: isTemp
Parameter.Abstract: True value specifies the changes are temporary overwrides for settings. The changes are not saved into the EEPROM and take immediate effect (no rebooting required). False value specifies the changes are permanently overwrides for settings And also saved into the EEPROM. The changes will keep after rebooting the device.

Token.Abstract: Set Frequency List Sets the channel of hopping frequency in MHz.

Parameter.Name: isTemp
Parameter.Abstract: If the value is true, this setting will write into EEPROM.

Parameter.Name: frequencyList
Parameter.Abstract: Specifies the channel of hopping frequency for reading tag data.

Token.Abstract: Set the threshold to raise a TagPresentedEvent(UHFCallback.didDiscoveredTag).

Parameter.Name: isTemp
Parameter.Abstract: True value specifies the changes are temporary overwrides for settings. The changes are not saved into the EEPROM and take immediate effect (no rebooting required). False value specifies the changes are permanently overwrides for settings And also saved into the EEPROM. The changes will keep after rebooting the device.

Parameter.Name: time
Parameter.Abstract: The period to raising a TagPresentedEvent. range: 1~255 (Unit: 100ms), 0:Always repeating raising event, 255: Never repeating raising event.

Token.Abstract: Get the threshold to raise a TagRemovedEvent(UHFCallback.didDiscoveredTag).

Parameter.Name: isTemp
Parameter.Abstract: True value specifies the changes are temporary overwrides for settings. The changes are not saved into the EEPROM and take immediate effect (no rebooting required). False value specifies the changes are permanently overwrides for settings And also saved into the EEPROM. The changes will keep after rebooting the device.

Token.Abstract: Set the threshold to raise a TagRemovedEvent(UHFCallback.didTagRemoved).

Parameter.Name: isTemp
Parameter.Abstract: True value specifies the changes are temporary overwrides for settings. The changes are not saved into the EEPROM and take immediate effect (no rebooting required). False value specifies the changes are permanently overwrides for settings And also saved into the EEPROM. The changes will keep after rebooting the device.

Parameter.Name: round
Parameter.Abstract: The count of missing discovering tag threshold of inventory rounds.

Token.Abstract: Get the threshold to raise a TagRemovedEvent(UHFCallback.didTagRemoved).

Parameter.Name: isTemp
Parameter.Abstract: True value specifies the changes are temporary overwrides for settings. The changes are not saved into the EEPROM and take immediate effect (no rebooting required). False value specifies the changes are permanently overwrides for settings And also saved into the EEPROM. The changes will keep after rebooting the device.

Token.Abstract: Set the InventoryRoundInterval /// @param isTemp True value specifies the changes are temporary overwrides for settings. The changes are not saved into the EEPROM and take immediate effect (no rebooting required). False value specifies the changes are permanently overwrides for settings And also saved into the EEPROM. The changes will keep after rebooting the device.

Parameter.Name: tenMilliSeconds
Parameter.Abstract: The period to start an inventory round. Range: 0~254*10s. 255 represent 0;

Token.Abstract: Get the InventoryRoundInterval

Parameter.Name: isTemp
Parameter.Abstract: True value specifies the changes are temporary overwrides for settings. The changes are not saved into the EEPROM and take immediate effect (no rebooting required). False value specifies the changes are permanently overwrides for settings And also saved into the EEPROM. The changes will keep after rebooting the device.

Token.Abstract: Get Device Information Gets the firmware program version running on the device.
Start Inventory mEPC Tag. Starts the process of tag inventory using specified trigger source.

Parameter.Name: tagPresentedType
Parameter.Abstract: Specify the way of triggering the RF power to read tag data.

Token.Abstract: * Start inventory tags with specific encoded data type.

Parameter.Name: tagDataEncodeType
Parameter.Abstract: ex:tagDataEncodeType = UDC | EANUPCEAS;

Token.Abstract: Stop Inventory mEPC Tag. Stops the process of tag inventory.
Write EPC

Parameter.Name: hexAccessPassword
Parameter.Abstract: The password of the tag.

Parameter.Name: epcData
Parameter.Abstract: The epc data that is going to write into tag.

Token.Abstract: Write EPC

Parameter.Name: hexAccessPassword
Parameter.Abstract: Specifies the password to write data.

Parameter.Name: memoryBank
Parameter.Abstract: Specifies which memory bank to write.

Parameter.Name: startWordAddress
Parameter.Abstract: Specifies the start word address of memory bank to write data.When write EPC bank, notice that EPC starts from address 02, the first two 2 words are for CRC and PC.

Parameter.Name: data
Parameter.Abstract: Specifies the data to write to memory bank.

Token.Abstract: Write EPC

Parameter.Name: hexSelectedPcEpc
Parameter.Abstract: Specifies the tag PC EPC to be selected.

Parameter.Name: hexAccessPassword
Parameter.Abstract: Specifies the password to write data.

Parameter.Name: memoryBank
Parameter.Abstract: Specifies which memory bank to write.

Parameter.Name: startWordAddress
Parameter.Abstract: Specifies the start word address of memory bank to write data.When write EPC bank, notice that EPC starts from address 02, the first two 2 words are for CRC and PC.

Parameter.Name: data
Parameter.Abstract: Specifies the data to write to memory bank.

Token.Abstract: Read EPC Reads tag data from given memory bank.

Parameter.Name: password
Parameter.Abstract: Password of the tag that is going to read. (4 byte/2 Hex String)

Token.Abstract: Read Tag

Parameter.Name: hexSelectedPcEpc
Parameter.Abstract: Specifies the tag PC EPC to be selected.

Parameter.Name: hexAccessPassword
Parameter.Abstract: Specifies the password to write data.

Parameter.Name: memoryBank
Parameter.Abstract: Specifies which memory bank to write.

Parameter.Name: startWordAddress
Parameter.Abstract: Specifies the start word address of memory bank to read data.When read EPC bank, notice that EPC starts from address 02, the first two 2 words are for CRC and PC.

Parameter.Name: readLength
Parameter.Abstract: Specifies the length to read from memory bank.

Token.Abstract: Read Tag

Parameter.Name: hexAccessPassword
Parameter.Abstract: Specifies the password to write data.

Parameter.Name: memoryBank
Parameter.Abstract: Specifies which memory bank to write.

Parameter.Name: startWordAddress
Parameter.Abstract: Specifies the start word address of memory bank to read data.When read EPC bank, notice that EPC starts from address 02, the first two 2 words are for CRC and PC.

Parameter.Name: readLength
Parameter.Abstract: Specifies the length to read from memory bank.

Token.Abstract: Use accessPassword to Lock the first tag that is inventoried.

Parameter.Name: accessPassword
Parameter.Abstract: Access Password

Parameter.Name: lockInfos
Parameter.Abstract: The Lock Action to specified memory bank. see GNPLockInfos.h

Token.Abstract: Lock the first tag that is inventoried. The Access password is decided by the remote connected device.

Parameter.Name: lockInfos
Parameter.Abstract: The Lock Action to specified memory bank. see GNPLockInfos.h

Token.Abstract: Kill Tag

Parameter.Abstract: Access Password

Parameter.Name: hexKillPassword
Parameter.Abstract: Kill Password
